posts.post_content:
I love how when people see this card they immediately think "Reanimation Deck". I love this just for getting back guys after they've been hated on from the battlefield, *"Oh you killed my [Geist-Honored Monk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Geist-Honored Monk)? Well guess what, she's back with even more friends!"*   
  
Really awesome card all around, reanimation deck / getting key players back etc. I think it can nicely fit into any Black / White deck that is packing some nice creatures.

posts.post_content:
This is what you want to do in Solar Flare:  
  
Turn 1: Land, maybe [Ponder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ponder).  
Turn 2: Counter/Kill spell.  
Turn 3: [Liliana of the Veil](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Liliana of the Veil) discarding this, or [Forbidden Alchemy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Forbidden Alchemy) discarding this and a fatty.  
Turn 4: Use Liliana to discard a fatty and play this.  
  
Turn 4 Titans or Praetors are good, I hear.
posts.html:
This is what you want to do in Solar Flare:

Turn 1: Land, maybe Ponder.
Turn 2: Counter/Kill spell.
Turn 3: Liliana of the Veil discarding this, or Forbidden Alchemy discarding this and a fatty.
Turn 4: Use Liliana to discard a fatty and play this.

Turn 4 Titans or Praetors are good, I hear.

Posted By: Robface (10/17/2011 12:35:00 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Sideboard options against graveyard decks for Standard;  
[Nihil Spellbomb](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nihil Spellbomb) (whole graveyard)  
[Surgical Extraction](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Surgical Extraction) (instant speed response to this, good against decks with few win cons)  
And my favorite, [Noxious Revival](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Noxious Revival). Works well against uncastable ten mana creatures.  
And with all that, I'm still looking forward to seeing this card in action.
posts.html:
Sideboard options against graveyard decks for Standard;
Nihil Spellbomb (whole graveyard)
Surgical Extraction (instant speed response to this, good against decks with few win cons)
And my favorite, Noxious Revival. Works well against uncastable ten mana creatures.
And with all that, I'm still looking forward to seeing this card in action.
